summary: The @temporalio/create scaffolding tool generates a hello-world project with TypeScript ^4.4.2, but this version is incompatible with tsconfig/node20 which requires TypeScript >= 5 due to es2023 lib configuration.
userImpact: Users following the getting started guide cannot build the generated hello-world project on Node 20.
rootCause: TypeScript 4.4.2 does not support es2023 in the lib configuration, which is required by tsconfig/node20.
resolutionDetails: Closed in favor of issue #1125 which tracks Node 20 support.
keyQuote: Project fails to build. The created hello-world project is configured to use TypeScript ^4.4.2 but this is incompatible with the supplied version of tsconfig/node20
